name: Aria Station
desc: Aria Station was the locus of the Nightcross weapons development program. As such, the station is equipped with a vast experimental arnament that renders the station all but impenetrable to the dilapidated navies of the Pascal system.

name: NCA Headquarters
desc: Headquarters of the Nightcross Armory Corporation, the leading supplier of warships and weapons in the Pascal system.

name: Aria Research Complex
desc: Aria Station was the center of Nightcross Armory Corporation's weapons research program. To this day it remains fortified by virtue of its numerous facilities.
